name: Obstacle Surfer (No Ads Version)
description:
Endless runner style game

Avoid the Obstacles and Match the color of the Gates to get a High Score.

     📱Controls Android:

Move player(UP): Drag Character Up

Move player (DOWN): Drag Character Down

Change Color: Press on a Flag Icon on the right side to change the Color of the Player Character.

    🖥️Controls(PC):

Move player(UP):  W , UP ARROW key

Move player (DOWN): S, DOWN ARROW key

Change Color: R key (Red), G  key(Green), B key(Blue)

🌊🌊🌊

Info: This Game has no Sound.

🌊🌊🌊

If you not feel confortable to pay money for this Game there is a free Android Version here:

https://akibaculture.itch.io/obstacle-surfer-free-version

🌊🌊🌊
